Name: Starlight: Defence Command
About the game: The UPF is looking for Commanders to take on a tough but rewarding role within Defence Command, filled with possibilities, adventure â€“ and access to specialised Blueprints. Upon graduation from the Academy, you will be supplied with your very own cutting edge A.N.T. where you will be able to remotely perform your assignments, manage your career and customise tower Blueprints to your liking. With the aid of the Artificial Intelligent Defence Assistant or A.I.D.A. for short, you will be able to access Quantum Relay Stations throughout the galaxy, manage local nanite resources and create structures to defend UPF interests. Possibilities Use cutting edge defensive technologies to repel thousands of enemies bots. Create your own defensive solutions for the 16 known bot types - including anti-air. Finely tune your towers targeting priorities to get the best out of your towers. Master the local nanite resources and the powerful abilities they provide. Access the UPF Simulator to replay assignments with custom settings of your choosing. Adventure As a Commander within the UPF, you will take on a wide ranging list of assignments across much of the known galaxy. Be the first line of defence, protect dignitaries and other VIP's from outside threats. Perform assignments in a variety of conditions, objectives and secondary goals. Defend against enemies that adapt their resistances and fight back against your defensive structures. Blueprint Access Through the use of your A.N.T. you will be authorised to customise tower Blueprints in BILLIONS of different permutations. Put your Mastery to use and spend the points on powerful bonuses unlocked over the course of your career. Opportunities exist within the UPF to advance your career and improve your Rank. With increased Rank comes increased access to defensive Blueprints, further boosting the possible permutations that you have access to. SIGN UP TODAY!
